きちょうめんな性格でね
この順番にやると言ったらやる
google_translated:
I'm sorry I'm sorry
I will do it if I say that I will do this order

あの幽波紋ってやつを
もう１回だけ出すんだ

I just out of it once more

en_text: Even though it's just some egg-like thing, maybe I can have it ram into him...

google_translated: It's just an egg-like guy-

en_text: I-I'm gonna do it! I'm gonna be brave!

en_text: Asshole!

en_text: Just like Moses parted the Red Sea \Nand safely walked across the sea floor...

海を真っ二つに裂いて 紅海を
渡ったっつーモーゼのように―
google_translated:
Binide the sea to the red sea
Like the Moses

en_text: ...I'm gonna make my way through your army and kick your ass!

この軍隊を突破して
おめえをぶったたいてやるっすよ！

Breaking out this army
I'm going to do my best!

en_text: Idiot! Everything is going exactly as planned, Higashikata Josuke!

作戦は予告どおりに進行中なのだよ
東方仗助！

en_text: A-A landmine?!

（仗助）
じ… 地雷！？
google_translated: ... Landmines!?

en_text: First your leg, and now your arm!

そしてアパッチ ミサイル発射！

And Apache Missile Lunch!

en_text: Let's see if you can survive a barrage of every missile, shell, \Nand round my Bad Company has with that injured arm of yours!

全ミサイル 全砲弾―

My Bad Company
All missile all guns-

en_text: You want me to let you go?

見逃してほしいとでも
言うのか？

Even if you want to miss
Do you say?

jp_text: なっ！

en_text: I've already carried out my plan.

俺の作戦はよ
すでに終了したんだよ

I already finished

忘れたのかい？
